Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_end_time_error
error_list.description: The end time should be 1 hour later than start time

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_name_invalid
error_list.description: The name of add on deal can't exceed 25 characters

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_over_size
error_list.description: A maximum of 1000 add on deals can be created

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_set_error
error_list.description: Please input per gift number between 1 to 50

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_edit_error
error_list.description: Please input correct promotion purchase limit

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_start_time_error
error_list.description: The start time should be 1 hour later than current time

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_set_error
error_list.description: Please input add on deal purchase limit between 1 to 100

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_type_error
error_list.description: Please input correct promotion type: Add-on discount=0; Gift with min.spend=1

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.
